groups.title: 一、听短对话回答问题（共5小题，每小题1分，共5分）

title_urls.content: 一、听短对话回答问题（共5小题，每小题1分，共5分）
title_urls.name: 287138b6e29e4222a916.mp3

directions_urls.name: 62a7cc14c85547c99a6f.mp3
directions_urls.content: 你将听到五组对话，每组对话听一遍。听对话前，你有20秒钟时间阅读所有小题。听完每组对话后，你还有5秒钟的时间在屏幕上点击你认为最合适的备选答案。在听到提示音后，进入下一小题。

questions.directions: 你将听到五组对话，每组对话听一遍。听对话前，你有20秒钟时间阅读所有小题。听完每组对话后，你还有5秒钟的时间在屏幕上点击你认为最合适的备选答案。在听到提示音后，进入下一小题。

body_urls.name: WF-JH1M08-A1-1.mp3
body_urls.content:
M: Happy birthday, Alice! Here is a CD for you.

W: Thank you. I love it very much.

subs.body: Which month is the girl's birthday in?

body_urls.name: WF-JH1M08-A1-2.mp3
body_urls.content:
M: Is your birthday in March?

W: No, my birthday is in the twelfth month of the year.

subs.body: Who will have a birthday party this Sunday?

body_urls.name: WF-JH1M08-A1-3.mp3
body_urls.content:
M: Will you have a birthday party this Sunday?

W: No, I won't. It's my sister's party.

body_urls.name: WF-JH1M08-A1-4.mp3
body_urls.content:
M: Today is May 15th. Is tomorrow your birthday, Kate?

W: Yes, it is. Tomorrow I will be fourteen years old.

M: Happy birthday to you!

subs.body: What did Tina's father buy for her on her birthday?

body_urls.name: WF-JH1M08-A1-5.mp3
body_urls.content:
M: Tina! What did your father buy for you on your birthday?

W: Oh, I want a camera. But he didn't buy one for me. He bought a basketball.

M: What a pity!

groups.title: 二、听长对话回答问题（共5小题，每小题1分，共5分）

title_urls.content: 二、听长对话回答问题（共5小题，每小题1分，共5分）
title_urls.name: db76ae864e5348428ab1.mp3

directions_urls.content: 你将听到一段对话，对话听两遍。听对话前，你有20秒钟时间阅读所有小题。听完对话后，每小题你还有5秒钟的时间在屏幕上点击你认为最合适的备选答案。在听到提示音后，进入下一小题。
directions_urls.name: 21dfc7c6f1ae4a409f73.mp3

body_urls.name: ZB-JH4U05-B1.mp3
body_urls.content:
W: Hi. Tom. Can you help me with my homework about Father Christmas?

M: OK. In Britain, children write letters to Father Christmas, and they ask him for presents.

W: Great. What does he look like?

M: He wears a red hat and a red suit. He is very fat and has white hair and a long white beard.

W: And what does he do?

M: On Christmas Eve, he goes to children's homes and gives them presents at night. He puts the presents in socks.

W: Can kids visit him?

M: Sure. He sometimes goes to shops and children can visit him there and get some presents from him.

W: That's so interesting! Thank you for your great help.

questions.directions: 你将听到一段对话，对话听两遍。听对话前，你有20秒钟时间阅读所有小题。听完对话后，每小题你还有5秒钟的时间在屏幕上点击你认为最合适的备选答案。在听到提示音后，进入下一小题。

subs.body: Why does the girl want to know about Father Christmas?
What is not right about Father Christmas?
What does the girl think of the boy's telling?

groups.title: 三、听短文回答问题（共5小题，每小题1分，共5分）

title_urls.content: 三、听短文回答问题（共5小题，每小题1分，共5分）
title_urls.name: 9d0379b7b1d74a49b9eb.mp3

directions_urls.content: 你将听到一篇短文，短文听两遍。听短文前，你有20秒钟时间阅读所有小题。听完短文后，每小题你还有5秒钟的时间在屏幕上点击你认为最合适的备选答案。在听到提示音后，进入下一小题。
directions_urls.name: feed0e949ae74c79a62d.mp3

body_urls.name: ZB-JH4U05-C1.mp3
body_urls.content: New Year's Day is coming. I'd like to invite my four friends to come to my family dinner party. My parents welcome my friends to come to our house. They would like to cook many delicious and nutritious foods to treat my friends. So I have written a letter of invitation and have sent emails to my four friends. Tim was my classmate in my high school and he has soon replied to my invitation letter. He'll join the dinner party. Alice is a member of our School Sport Club. She also has answered my letter and will try to come to our dinner party on time. Victor is my pen pal and he hasn't replied to my invitation. Bacon is my college classmate and he has answered that he's unable to attend the party because he has planned to travel. I hope my invitation will bring more happiness to my friends.

questions.directions: 你将听到一篇短文，短文听两遍。听短文前，你有20秒钟时间阅读所有小题。听完短文后，每小题你还有5秒钟的时间在屏幕上点击你认为最合适的备选答案。在听到提示音后，进入下一小题。

subs.body: How many friends would the boy like to invite?
What would the boy's parents like to cook to treat his friends?
How has the boy invited his friends?

options: He has found his friends and told them.
He has called everyone with a mobile phone.
He has written a letter of invitation and sent emails to them.

subs.body: Who has answered email and will try to come to the dinner party on time?
Why is Bacon unable to attend the party?

options: Because he has to do a lot of housework.

questions.body: At my birthday party, my mother usually buys a special birthday cake. My friends sing Happy Birthday, and then I cut it. My friends usually give me cards and presents. I always love birthday parties.
answer: At my birthday party, my mother usually buys a special birthday cake. My friends sing Happy Birthday, and then I cut it. My friends usually give me cards and presents. I always love birthday parties.

directions_urls.name: 5ebfcc69cfe847019d80.mp3
directions_urls.content: 你有90秒钟的时间熟悉屏幕上的短文，并作朗读准备。在听到“开始录音”的信号后，请在90秒钟内朗读短文一遍。

groups.title: 五、情景问答（共3小题，每小题2分，共6分）

title_urls.content: 五、情景问答（共3小题，每小题2分，共6分）
title_urls.name: 5fc999d65c1e4062bd5b.mp3

directions_urls.content: 你将听到一段英文对话，对话听两遍。在听完对话并做20秒钟准备后，请根据听到的内容和屏幕提示，用英语回答问题。每小题的作答时间为15秒钟。在听到提示音后，进入下一小题。
directions_urls.name: 5318c4e8ec584a16af49.mp3

body_urls.name: ZB-JH4U05-E1.mp3
body_urls.content:
W: Dad, I want to have a party at home this Sunday evening. Could I invite my friends here?

M: Of course, dear. Sounds fun.

W: Great, you are so nice, Dad. Could you give some money? I need to go shopping and buy some food.

M: Well. I'm going shopping tomorrow. What food and drinks do you need?

W: Let me see... I need some snacks and some juice like apple juice and orange juice.

M: I see. Snacks, apple juice, orange juice. Is that OK?

W: Yes, thank you, Dad.

M: But you should clean the house after the party.

W: OK, I see.

questions.directions: 你将听到一段英文对话，对话听两遍。在听完对话并做20秒钟准备后，请根据听到的内容和屏幕提示，用英语回答问题。每小题的作答时间为15秒钟。在听到提示音后，进入下一小题。

subs.body: What is the girl going to do this Sunday evening?
answer: Have a party.@@She is going to have a party.@@The girl is going to have a party.@@She is going to have a party this Sunday evening.@@The girl is going to have a party this Sunday evening.@@She's going to have a party.@@She's going to have a party this Sunday evening.

subs.body: Who will buy the food and drinks?
answer: The girl's father will buy the food and drinks.@@The girl's dad.@@The girl's father.@@The girl's dad will buy the food and drinks.@@The girl's dad will.@@The girl's father will.@@The girl's father will buy them.@@The girl's dad will buy them.

subs.body: When should the girl clean the house?
answer: After the party.@@The girl should clean the house after the party.@@She should clean the house after the party.

questions.body: James 是一个商人，他很有钱。下个周日是他妈妈的生日，他想举办一个盛大的聚会，给妈妈买一个漂亮的礼物。聚会将在一个大饭馆举行。James计划邀请120人参加这个聚会。聚会上会有一个大蛋糕。James买了一个机器人送给他妈妈。这个机器人800美元，它很有趣、实用。机器人可以和人聊天、做家务。尽管很贵，James觉得值得。他相信他的妈妈会喜欢这个礼物和聚会。
answer: James is a businessman and he is very rich. Next Sunday is his mother's birthday. He wants to hold a great birthday party and buy a nice present for her. The birthday party will be held in a big restaurant. James plans to invite one hundred and twenty people to the party. There will be a large birthday cake in the party. James bought a robot for his mother. It cost him eight hundred dollars. It is very interesting and useful. The robot can chat with people and do housework. Although it is expensive, James thinks it is worth buying. He believes that his mother will like his present and the party.@@James is a businessman and he has a lot of money. Next Sunday is his mother's birthday. He wants to have a big party for her and buy a nice present. The birthday party will be held in a big restaurant. He plans to invite one hundred and twenty people. There will be a big birthday cake in the party. James bought a robot for his mother. He spent eight hundred dollars on it. It is very interesting and useful. The robot can chat with people and do housework. The robot is expensive, but James thinks it is worth buying. He believes that his mother will like his present and the party.

directions_urls.content: 你将听到一篇英文短文，短文听两遍，并在屏幕上看到该短文的汉语要点提示。在听完短文并做60秒钟准备后，请根据听到的内容和屏幕提示进行复述，复述内容需包含所有要点。录音时间为90秒钟。
directions_urls.name: 67b171e46e2e484d862a.mp3

body_urls.name: ZB-JH4U05-F1.mp3
body_urls.content: James is a businessman and he is very rich. Next Sunday is his mother's birthday. He wants to hold a great birthday party and buy a nice present for her. The birthday party will be held in a big restaurant. James plans to invite one hundred and twenty people to the party. There will be a large birthday cake in the party. James bought a robot for his mother. It cost him eight hundred dollars. It is very interesting and useful. The robot can chat with people and do housework. Although it is expensive, James thinks it is worth buying. He believes that his mother will like his present and the party.
